casename: Nuplex Industries Ltd v Panatron Pte Ltd
counsel: Gan Kam Yuin/ Boey Swee Siang [Bih Li & Lee] for the plaintiffs; Anand K Thiagarajan/Ramesh Appoo [Anand T & Co] for the defendants

headings.text: The fax then went on to discuss the arrangements for the shipment of the next three full container loads under apparently 3 contracts for the sales of goods.
